links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = (1/2)*(-5*(n mod 4) + 2*((n+1) mod 4) + ((n+2) mod 4) + 8*((n+3) mod 4)) - 31*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 10 2009From _Bruno Berselli_, Mar 07 2011: (Start)G.f.: (7 + x + 2*x^2 + x^3 + 7*x^4)/(1-x^4).a(n) = (6*(-i)^n + 6*i^n + 7*(-1)^n + 9)/2 - 7*A000007(n), where i is the imaginary unit. (End)
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 19000); x=contfrac(sqrt(60)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040052.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 07 2009(MAGMA)  [7] cat &cat[ [1, 2, 1, 14]: n in [1..18]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Mar 07 2011
